cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's renraku

sentence.kanji: 仕事が終わったら連絡します。
sentence.romaji: shigoto ga owatara renraku shimasu
sentence.english: I'll contact you when I finish the job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's setsuzoku

sentence.kanji: コンピューターをネットワークに接続しました。
sentence.romaji: konpyu-ta- wo netowa-ku ni setsuzoku shimashita
sentence.english: The computer was connected with the network.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tetsuzuki

sentence.kanji: 入国手続きが終わりました。
sentence.romaji: nyuukoku tetsuzuki ga owarimashita
sentence.english: The immigration procedures are finished.

cards.english: in rapid succession, one after another
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zokuzoku

sentence.kanji: お客さんが続々とやって来ましたよ。
sentence.romaji: okyakusan ga zokuzoku to yatekimashita yo
sentence.english: The guests came one after another.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuzuki

sentence.kanji: 話の続きは電話でしましょう。
sentence.romaji: hanashi no tsuzuki ha denwa de shimashou
sentence.english: Let's continue this conversation on the phone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heru

sentence.kanji: 彼は新聞記者を経て作家になりました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shinbun kisha wo hete saka ni narimashita
sentence.english: He became a writer after being a journalist.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakari

sentence.kanji: 彼女は会場整理の係だったの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kaijou seiri no kakari data no
sentence.english: She was in charge of the hall arrangement.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's orimono

sentence.kanji: その町は織物業で有名です。
sentence.romaji: sono machi ha orimonogyou de yuumei desu
sentence.english: The town is famous for the textile industry.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gekyuu

sentence.kanji: 月給は毎月25日に支給されます。
sentence.romaji: gekyuu ha maitsuki nijuugonichi ni shikyuu saremasu
sentence.english: The salary is paid on the 25th of every month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jikyuu

sentence.kanji: この仕事は時給1000円です。
sentence.romaji: kono shigoto ha jikyuu senen desu
sentence.english: This work pays 1000 yen per hour.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jouyaku

sentence.kanji: 2国間で条約が結ばれました。
sentence.romaji: nikokukan de jouyaku ga musubaremashita
sentence.english: A treaty was concluded between the two countries.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touitsu

sentence.kanji: 文字の大きさは統一してください。
sentence.romaji: moji no ookisa ha touitsu shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please standardize the size of the characters.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toukei

sentence.kanji: これは昨年の売り上げの統計です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha sakunen no uriage no toukei desu
sentence.english: These are the statistics for last year's sales.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soukai

sentence.kanji: 来月の総会は東京で行われます。
sentence.romaji: raigetsu no soukai ha toukyou de okonawaremasu
sentence.english: The general meeting next month is to be held in Tokyo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sougou

sentence.kanji: 全員の意見を総合してみましょう。
sentence.romaji: zenin no iken wo sougou shite mimashou
sentence.english: Let's put all the opinions together.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sousuu

sentence.kanji: 参加者の総数は705人でした。
sentence.romaji: sankasha no sousuu ha 705 nin deshita
sentence.english: The total number of attendees was 705.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakuin

sentence.kanji: 索引はたいてい本の後ろについていますよ。
sentence.romaji: sakuin ha taitei hon no ushiro ni tsuite imasu yo
sentence.english: The index is usually found in the end of the book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dasen

sentence.kanji: 地震で電車が脱線したよ。
sentence.romaji: jishin de densha ga dasen shita yo
sentence.english: The train was derailed due to the earthquake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's densen

sentence.kanji: 風で電線が揺れていますね。
sentence.romaji: kaze de densen ga yurete imasu ne
sentence.english: The electric wires are shaking in the wind.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keireki

sentence.kanji: あなたの経歴をメールで送ってください。
sentence.romaji: anata no keireki wo me-ru de okute kudasai
sentence.english: Please send your resume by e-mail.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsugu

sentence.kanji: 彼は父親の店を継いだの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chichioya no mise wo tsuida no
sentence.english: He took over his father's shop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's souri

sentence.kanji: 総理はヨーロッパを訪問中です。
sentence.romaji: souri ha yo-ropa wo houmonchuu desu
sentence.english: The prime minister is on a visit to Europe.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's isho

sentence.kanji: 一緒に食事しようか。
sentence.romaji: isho ni shokuji shiyou ka
sentence.english: Do you want to eat together?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naisho

sentence.kanji: この話は課長には内緒ですよ。
sentence.romaji: kono hanashi ha kachou ni ha naisho desu yo
sentence.english: You have to keep this secret from the section chief.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soujuu

sentence.kanji: このボートは操縦が簡単です。
sentence.romaji: kono bo-to ha soujuu ga kantan desu
sentence.english: This boat is easy to operate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tategaki

sentence.kanji: 作文は縦書きで書いてください。
sentence.romaji: sakubun ha tategaki de kaitekudasai
sentence.english: Please write the composition in vertical columns.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chokugo

sentence.kanji: 食べた直後に寝ないほうがいいよ。
sentence.romaji: tabeta chokugo ni nenai hou ga ii yo
sentence.english: You should not sleep immediately after having eaten.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakusen

sentence.kanji: 白線の内側に下がってお待ちください。
sentence.romaji: hakusen no uchigawa ni sagate omachi kudasai
sentence.english: Please stand behind the white lines as you wait.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinkei

sentence.kanji: 彼は神経が細かいですね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shinkei ga komakai desu ne
sentence.english: He is very sensitive.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shousai

sentence.kanji: 詳細はお気軽にお問い合わせ下さい。
sentence.romaji: shousai ha okigaru ni otoiawase kudasai
sentence.english: Please do not hesitate to inquire for further details.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokorobosoi

sentence.kanji: 夜道の一人歩きは心細いね。
sentence.romaji: yomichi no hitoriaruki ha kokorobosoi ne
sentence.english: Walking alone at night makes one feel uneasy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's igo

sentence.kanji: すみません、以後気を付けます。
sentence.romaji: sumimasen igo ki wo tsukemasu
sentence.english: Sorry, I'll be more careful from now on.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keika

sentence.kanji: 手術後の経過は順調です。
sentence.romaji: shujutsu go no keika ha junchou desu
sentence.english: Progress after the operation is going well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tate

sentence.kanji: 縦2列に並んでください。
sentence.romaji: tate 2 retsu ni narande kudasai
sentence.english: Please line up in two rows lengthways.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atomodori

sentence.kanji: 彼女は途中で後戻りしました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha tochuu de atomodori shimashita
sentence.english: She turned back half-way through.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimekiri

sentence.kanji: 申し込みの締め切りはいつですか。
sentence.romaji: moushikomi no shimekiri ha itsu desu ka
sentence.english: When is the deadline for the application?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimekiru

sentence.kanji: 応募受付は締め切りました。
sentence.romaji: oubo uketsuke ha shimekirimashita
sentence.english: The deadline for receipt of applications is closed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimaru

sentence.kanji: レバーを右に回すと締まります。
sentence.romaji: reba- wo migi ni mawasu to shimarimasu
sentence.english: It will shut when the lever is turned to the right.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's torishimaru

sentence.kanji: 警察が飲酒運転を取り締まっていますよ。
sentence.romaji: keisatsu ga inshu unten wo torishimate imasu yo
sentence.english: The police are cracking down on drunk driving.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's renzoku

sentence.kanji: 彼女の人生は苦労の連続でした。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no jinsei ha kurou no renzoku deshita
sentence.english: Her life was a series of hardships.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shukushou

sentence.kanji: これを縮小して印刷してください。
sentence.romaji: kore wo shukushou shite insatsu shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please reduce and print this.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chijimeru

sentence.kanji: 彼はタイムを1秒縮めたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha taimu wo 1 byou chijimeta no
sentence.english: He reduced the time by one second.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chijimu

sentence.kanji: この服の縮み具合はひどい。
sentence.romaji: kono fuku no chijimi guai ha hidoi
sentence.english: These clothes have shrunk terribly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chijimi

sentence.kanji: この服の縮み具合はひどい。
sentence.romaji: kono fuku no chijimi guai ha hidoi
sentence.english: These clothes have shrunk terribly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chijimaru

sentence.kanji: 兄との身長の差が縮まった。
sentence.romaji: ani to no shinchou no sa ga chijimata
sentence.english: The difference in height between me and my big brother has decreased.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tougou

sentence.kanji: 三つの町が統合されて新しい市が誕生したのよ。
sentence.romaji: mitsu no machi ga tougou sarete atarashii shi ga tanjou shita no yo
sentence.english: Three towns were merged and a new city was created.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiasate

sentence.kanji: 会議は明々後日に延期された。
sentence.romaji: kaigi ha shiasate ni enki sareta
sentence.english: The meeting was postponed to three days from today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sousai

sentence.kanji: あの人は日本銀行の総裁です。
sentence.romaji: ano hito ha niponginkou no sousai desu
sentence.english: That person is the president of the Bank of Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuuryou

sentence.kanji: コンサートは夜7時5分に終了しました。
sentence.romaji: konsa-to ha yoru shichi ji go fun ni shuuryou shimashita
sentence.english: The concert ended at 7:05 pm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osameru

sentence.kanji: 自動車税を納めたよ。
sentence.romaji: jidoushazei wo osameta yo
sentence.english: I paid my car tax.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's natoku

sentence.kanji: 彼の説明で納得できました。
sentence.romaji: kare no setsumei de natoku dekimashita
sentence.english: I was able to accept his explanation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keizoku

sentence.kanji: ものごとは根気よく継続することが大切です。
sentence.romaji: mono goto ha konki yoku keizoku suru koto ga taisetsu desu
sentence.english: When doing anything, it's important to keep at it persistently.
